data.title: Actors Iain Glen and Susannah Harker at the reception prior to the Evening Standard Drama Awards in London. 28/1/02: It was announced that the couple have separated after eight
meta_keywords: celebrity couple smiling 3/4 three quarter length
data.meta_description: Download this stock image: Actors Iain Glen and Susannah Harker at the reception prior to the Evening Standard Drama Awards in London. 28/1/02: It was announced that the couple have separated after eight-years of marriage. * The couple, who have one son, decided to go their separate ways in what was described as an 'amicable separation'. - G43GRK from Alamy's library of millions of high resolution stock photos, illustrations and vectors.
